content: **crocheted hat and neck warmer in drops air work in the round top down ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see ivory drift neck warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #ivorydriftset drops design pattern ai-541 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- * for the entire set **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-200-200 g colour 01 off white * hat **size** s/m - m/l - l/xl head circumference 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 01 off white **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row vertically on hook size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized hook or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized hook 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-20-ivory-drift-neck-warmer
